title: Sunny Rittenhouse Sq. Penthouse Studio, Most Utilities Included!
description:
h3>Rittenhouse Sq. Penthouse Studio, Most Utilities Included! Great Building/24 Doorman, right on park!
Renovated top floor penthouse studio in the Savoy, right on Rittenhouse Square:
Newer kitchen with Stainless appliances
Gas stove, Garbage Disposal, Built in Microwave
Dark wood cabinets and granite countertop
California style closet system
Marble-Walled bathroom with frameless glass shower
In-Unit Washer And Dryer
Hardwood floors
Free Heat, A/C, Electric, Gas and Water!!!
Condo fees include ALL utilities except for Internet & cable. Tenant responsible for $85/mo cable bill charged by the building to all units.
24 Hr Doorman,Nearby Rooftop Deck, In-building Gym (monthly fee)
Brightly lit with great sun.
Located in the Savoy Building. 400 sq ft on the 21st floor
Access to the roof deck on the same floor.
Rittenhouse Square always has something going on, and it's right out the front door!
Walking distance to the University of Pennsylvania, Drexel University, Thomas Jefferson University, Curtis
Institute, etc and all public transportation hubs. First and last month's rent and 1 month security deposit due with signing of lease.
Ready for showing by appointment. Unit is available May 31st. $1620/mo
Building requires a 12 month lease.
Hit the Reply button for more information

title: Amazing 1 Bedroom/1 Bath Apartment Philadelphia
description:
This amazing apartment showcases custom finishes and details, including rectified porcelain tile floors, substantial arched millwork and doors, rounded plasterwork, extensive recessed and cove lighting and vintage Art Deco metalwork in the reception area and at the living room fireplace. With so many windows and its extensive wraparound terrace, the natural light is fantastic. The formal reception foyer, with its cove-lit “rotunda” and custom tile inlay, provides an elegant welcome to guests.
Beyond the foyer, this residence gets even more incredible with a wealth of features designed for entertaining in style. From its “great room” and wraparound, dog-friendly terrace with spectacular views and smartly designed space that accommodates a sitting area with wood burning fireplace, a full-size bar, den television area with mahogany built-ins, to its formal dining room that can seat 20 to its kitchen with pro-grade appliances and many linear feet of carefully planned cabinetry and countertops.

title: Cozy 1 BR w/ Shared Courtyard and more!
description:
Beautiful one-bedroom apartment with hardwood floors and plenty of closet space throughout! The separate kitchen comes with all modern appliances, lots of cabinet space, and a breakfast bar! The living room and bedroom receive a good deal of natural sunlight throughout the day. The building is accompanied by a shared courtyard that includes picnic tables, bike racks, bird feeders, and a water fountain! Laundry is within the building and comes with an additional storage unit!
This apartment building is found on the quaint Waverly Street between Lombard and Pine, perfectly located between both Rittenhouse Square and Fitler Square! Beautiful residential area of the city! Rittenhouse is well known for combining the attractions of downtown living with the quiet living of a residential neighborhood. Each block is scenic, with endless restaurants, cafes, shopping, transportation, and nightlife at your fingertips.

title: Magnificence of the past in with the advanced conveniences of today!
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on the National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment near Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors. Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & Boxing. Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media Room. Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. On-Site Green Drop Donation Box. ** Pricing and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **

title: ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today!
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on the National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment near Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors. Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & Boxing. Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media Room. Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. On-Site Green Drop Donation Box. ** Pricing and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **

title: 1232 N Front Street #PH6 - Premier penthouse
description:
1232 N Front Street #PH6 - Premier penthouse 2 bedroom, 2 bath residence in the desirable Fishtown Station with GARAGE parking and a roof deck with stunning skyline views. Located in the heart of Philadelphia’s red-hot Fishtown neighborhood. This luxury condo features excellent natural light throughout, hardwood floors, recessed lighting, and an open floor plan. Once inside, you’ll find yourself in a spotless modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a large kitchen island with pendant lighting and space for bar seating. The generously sized living space is perfect for entertaining or can be used as a work-from-home space. The main bedroom offers great lighting, a good-sized closet, a ceiling fan, and an oversized en-suite bath. The spacious bathroom includes a double vanity and a soaking tub. The second bedroom also offers wonderful natural lighting, a good-sized closet, and a ceiling fan. The second hallway bathroom is modern, all white, crisp, and clean. On the second level at top of the steps is a pilot house with a dry bar that leads to your very own private, massive roof deck. Secured building with your own on-site garage parking. Walking distance to Girard Station, Laserwolf, Wm Mulherin & Sons, City Fitness, Suraya, Frankford Hall, The Filmore, Front Street Café, and so much more. No Pets. 1st, last, and 1 month’s rent is due when lease is signed.

title: ***Masterfully updated"" 3 bed 2 bath & update kitchen with Garage!!
description:
!!..Wonderful section of Lansdowne close proximity to Belmont Park. There are some obvious repairs needed and some outside maintenance however it is still a well laid out attractive popular Lansdowne Model. This is a 3 Bedroom 1 and a half Bath Home. The Cross St is Eldon. Neighborhood consists mostly of twins and singles. Belmont Park (Lansdowne) on Eldon Ave. Enter the main floor through the enclosed porch. The home is equipped with many outlets in each room, coat closet in Living Room, Radiant Heat throughout but not Foyer or Mud Room. Bright in that most rooms have multiple natural Lighting sources and Main Bedroom has some Recessed lighting. Enter a good size LR, DR and
update kitchen w/Breakfast Bar. Exit to rear deck. CAUTION: Steps of deck need repair. 1 car detached garage look for address. Second floor: 3 bedrooms one bath toilet is broken and water is shut off. Master BR, 2nd BR, and 3rd BR. A Large full size basement segmented to a Mechanical Area with Heater, and a Laundry Area and substantial remaining space to create a leisure room. Heater is broken we don’t know what is wrong with it.

title: ~""One bedroom on the 11th floor with sunset city views!
description: One bedroom on the 11th floor with sunset city views at The Wanamaker House, located just off of Rittenhouse Square! Residents of The Wanamaker House enjoy the 24-hour front desk, access to the roof top swimming pool, exercise room and sauna. Enter the home through a foyer with coat closet. There is a spacious living and dining room with floor-to-ceiling bay windows beaming with natural light. Open to the combined living and dining room, there is a kitchen with wood cabinetry and appliances. The bedroom features a wall closet and a large bay window, as well as easy access to an adjacent hall walk-in closet. There is a full hall bathroom with a vanity and shower/tub combination.
